I.name: New Destiny
description: {{sbc|Innate - Double Barrel:}} '''Graves'''' [[basic attacks]] consume [[ammunition]] within {{as|2 shells|buzzword3}}. He will {{tt|reload|Graves is unable to declare basic attacks during this time.}} over a few seconds immediately after expending all shells or withholding leftover shells for a while. The reload time is reduced by '''Graves'''' level and {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, and can be interrupted by declaring an attack or casting an ability.

{{sbc|Innate - 12-Gauge:}} '''Graves'''' basic attack sprays {{as|4 pellets|buzzword2}} in a cone, each colliding with the first enemy unit or structure in their path, dealing {{as|{{pp|key=%|70 to 100}} AD}} {{as|physical damage}} plus{{ft|{{as|{{pp|key=%|70*0.33302 to 100*0.33302}} AD}} damage|about one-third of the damage}}for each subsequent {{as|pellet|buzzword2}} hitting the same target, up to {{as|{{pp|key=%|70*(1+3*0.33302) to 100*(1+3*0.33302)}} AD}} {{as|physical damage}} against a single target. Pellets deal 25% reduced damage against [[structures]].

{{tip|Critical strikes}} spray {{as|6 pellets|buzzword2}} over a 25% wider cone, with each {{as|pellet|buzzword2}} dealing {{as|{{critical damage|20|26.667}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}, resulting in{{ft|{{sti|critical damage|{{as|{{fd|59.98}}% (+{{ii|Infinity Edge|icononly = true}}{{fd|12.44}}%)|critical damage}}}} '''bonus''' damage to attacks where all pellets hit.|{{as|{{pp|key=%|70*2*1.5998 to 100*2*1.5998}}|AD}} {{as|(+{{ii|Infinity Edge|icononly = true}}{{pp|key=%|70*2*0.1244 to 100*2*0.1244}}) AD}} {{as|physical damage}} if all pellets hit.}}

{{sbc|Innate - Buckshot:}} Non-champion units hit by more than one {{as|pellet|buzzword2}} are {{tip|airborne|knocked back}}, though not through terrain. All damage from pellets {{tip|applies life steal|applies}} {{stil|life steal}}, but only the first {{as|pellet|buzzword2}} to hit each enemy applies [[on-hit effect]]s.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Double Barrel: Graves' basic attacks consume ammunition within 2 shells. He will reload over a few seconds immediately after expending all shells or withholding leftover shells for a while. The reload time is reduced by Graves' level and bonus attack speed, and can be interrupted by declaring an attack or casting an ability.
Innate - 12-Gauge: Graves' basic attack sprays 4 pellets in a cone, each colliding with the first enemy unit or structure in their path, dealing 70% − 100% (based on level) AD physical damage plusfor each subsequent pellet hitting the same target, up to 70*(1+3*0.33302)% − 100*(1+3*0.33302)% (based on level) AD physical damage against a single target. Pellets deal 25% reduced damage against structures.
Critical strikes spray 6 pellets over a 25% wider cone, with each pellet dealing (+ IE 25%) bonus physical damage, resulting in
Innate - Buckshot: Non-champion units hit by more than one pellet are knocked back, though not through terrain. All damage from pellets applies Unknown value: stil / life steal, but only the first pellet to hit each enemy applies on-hit effects.
I.notes:
* The in-game HUD displays '''Graves'''' reload speed in place of his attack speed. This is a visual bug, and his attack speed behaves normally.
* His reload speed is in the form of reloads per second:
** '''Graves'''' bonus attack speed [[growth]] and the cap affect his reload speed, making his {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} more worth after each level.
** Reload speed: Scales less the more attack speed you have until {{as|150% '''bonus''' attack speed}} (not included growth). Going over that will decrease the reload speed until capping at {{as|200% '''bonus''' attack speed}}.
** The reload time after firing both '''shells''' and the time before the reloading starts while sitting on one shell are the same, of {{fd|2.08}} seconds. They're then reduced by {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}, to a minimum of {{pp|1.54;1.50;1.47;1.44;1.41;1.39;1.36;1.33;1.31;1.29;1.26;1.24;1.22;1.20;1.18;1.16;1.14;1.12|formula={{return}}• '''Time Cap''' = 1 / Reload Speed Cap. • '''Reload Speed Cap''' = 0.651 + ~0.014 per level, up to 0.891.}} seconds.
*** Reload speed at 150% bonus attack speed: {{pp|0.651; 0.665; 0.679; 0.694; 0.708; 0.722; 0.736; 0.750; 0.764; 0.778; 0.792; 0.806; 0.821; 0.835; 0.849; 0.863; 0.877; 0.891|round=false}}.
* The reload time with one '''shell''' is {{fd|1.3}} seconds.

* '''Graves'''' {{tip|attack windup}} is based on such a low value that it will always take only {{tt|1 game tick|1/30th of a second}}, even at the lowest possible {{sti|{{as|attack speed}}}} (''0.2AS'').
* When '''Graves' '''has his range increased by 35% to {{sti|range|{{fd|573.75}}}} via {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}, it has special effects on his cone spread:
** The reach of the individual missiles is also increased by 35% to {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{fd|843.75}} / {{tip|er|icononly = true}} {{tt|{{fd|783.75}}|Effective to-edge reach}}.
** The spread of the individual missiles is ''decreased'' by 35% (''angle {{times}} 1/1.35'') to {{tt|{{fd|17.{{recurring|7}}}}{{degree}}|RFC basic attack adjusted spread}} / {{tt|{{fd|22.{{recurring|2}}}}{{degree}}|RFC critical attack adjusted spread}}.
*** The reduced spread means that the empowered attack can deal adequate damage in a scaled-up cone.
* Given the right circumstances ''pellets'' can fly past and beyond the intended target without colliding with them, and thus collide with other enemies.
** Because the first pellet to hit an enemy deals unreduced damage, this can increase the total damage of the attack dealt, but spread across more targets instead.
** If '''Graves''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}} ''pellets'' will fly (still in a cone) in a random direction (excluding his target's) but he can still damage nearby enemy units hit by pellets.
* Structures will intercept and can be hit by multiple ''pellets'', as with other valid targets.
* {{tip|Wards}} and [[Jungle plants]] will not intercept ''pellets'', and instead be triggered by a hiden homing attack missile (3000 missile speed, 3400 on crit), reminiscent of the more standard ranged attack of pre-rework {{ci|Graves|variant = old}}.
** '''Graves''' will not collaterally damage wards or jungle plants, and blocking pellets from reaching the target ward or jungle plant will not prevent '''Graves''' from damaging them.
* The first {{as|pellet|buzzword2}} to hit an enemy deals {{tip|basic damage}}, additional ones to hit the same enemy from the same attack deal {{tip|default damage}}.
** Because of this, only the first pellet to hit each enemy applies on-hit effects (see further details below).
** The additional pellets still {{tip|applies life steal|apply life steal}}.
** {{ii|Warden's Mail}} only reduces damage from the first pellet to hit its wearer.
** {{pending for test}} {{iis|Randuin's Omen}} damage reduction to critical damage will apply to the damage of each pellet from a critical buckshot.
* Attack effects have a variety of interactions with '''New Destiny''':
** {{tip|On-hit}} effects are dealt to each stuck target, but not multiple times to the same target by subsequent pellets from the same attack.
*** The order is based on the order in which the targets are hit. "Single-use" on-hit effects (e.g. {{ii|Sheen|icononly = true}} {{nie|Spellblade}}) will be applied to the first enemy hit; the closest one.
** [[Attack_effects#On_Attacking|On-Action Effects]] such as {{ai|Help, Pix!|Lulu}} and {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} will be triggered, and still obey their standard target-acquisition rules. {{nie|Wind's Fury}} can select secondary targets that will also be damaged by collision from '''Graves'''' attack.
** {{ii|Kircheis Shard|icononly = true}} {{nie|Energized}} is special and will be applied by a hidden homing attack missile (3000 missile speed, 3400 on crit), reminiscent of the more standard ranged attack of pre-rework {{ci|Graves|variant = old}}. The effect is therefore guaranteed to affect his attack target.
** {{ii|Black Cleaver}} triggers on every instance of {{as|physical damage}}, so it will apply 1 stack when each individual ''pellet'' hits, stacking multiple times if multiple ''pellets'' hit the same target (Armor reduction does not take effect until the automatic stat update).

Q.name: End of the Line
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Graves''' fires a round in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies it passes through and leaves behind a powder trail.

After 2 seconds or after {{rutngt|0.2}} upon colliding with terrain, the round detonates, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies within a wide perpendicular area and in a reverse wave along the powder trail.
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Graves fires a round in the target direction that deals physical damage to all enemies it passes through and leaves behind a powder trail.
After 2 seconds or after 0.231 upon colliding with terrain, the round detonates, dealing physical damage to all enemies within a wide perpendicular area and in a reverse wave along the powder trail.
leveling: {{st|Detonation Damage|{{ap|85 to 225}} {{as|(+ {{ap|40 to 160}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|45+85 to 105+225}} {{as|(+ {{ap|80+40 to 80+160}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
Q.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} can only block one instance of the ability's damage.
* {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} will destroy the projectile entirely and mitigate all effects, including the trail on the ground. 
* {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} is considered to be terrain for the purposes of the projectile, triggering its second effect.
{{Effect at cast time end}}

effects.str: • Initial Physical Damage: (+ 80% bonus AD)

• Detonation Damage: (+ % bonus AD)
  • Total Damage: (+ % bonus AD)

W.name: Smoke Screen
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Graves''' fires a smoke canister at the target location that, upon impact, deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 50% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.

The canister creates a cloud of smoke for 4 seconds that applies {{tip|nearsight}} of outside the area to all enemies within every {{fd|0.25}} seconds, reducing their {{tip|sight}} radius relative to the center.
W.descriptionHtml:
Active: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target location that, upon impact, deals magic damage to enemies within the area and slows them by 50% for 0.5 seconds.
The canister creates a cloud of smoke for 4 seconds that applies nearsight of outside the area to all enemies within every 0.25 seconds, reducing their sight radius relative to the center.
W.notes:
* ''Smoke Screen'' will nearsight {{tip|untargetable}} units.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block the instance of damage and {{tip|slow}}, but will not mitigate the persistent area of effect.
* {{tip|cc-immune|Crowd control immunity}} and {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} have no effect on the user's {{tip|sight}} radius reduction despite the {{tip|nearsight}} being resisted / removed. Loss of allied vision will still be affected.
** Removing or resisting the nearsight will prevent it from being reapplied while staying inside the area (leaving and coming back inside will not).
* The nearsight debuff applies to non-champions but it does not inherently stop them from performing actions that require {{tip|sight}}, such as [[basic attack]]ing.
{{Effect at cast time end}}

E.name: Quickdraw
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Graves''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location, {{tip|basic attack reset|resetting}} his basic attack timer and reloading one {{as|shell|buzzword3}} while gaining a [[stack]] of ''True Grit'' for 4 seconds, stacking up to 8 times. Dashing towards an enemy {{tip|champion}} grants 2 stacks of ''True Grit''.
''Quickdraw's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by {{fd|0.5}} seconds for every {{as|pellet|buzzword2}} impacting an enemy.

{{sbc|True Grit:}} For each stack, '''Graves''' gains {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}}. Subsequent casts of ''Quickdraw'' and attacks versus non-minions will refresh the duration of ''True Grit''.
If '''Graves''' dashes while reloading, he can cast his other abilities during the dash.{{bug|1}}
''Quickdraw will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
E.descriptionHtml:
Active: Graves dashes to the target location, resetting his basic attack timer and reloading one shell while gaining a stack of True Grit for 4 seconds, stacking up to 8 times. Dashing towards an enemy champion grants 2 stacks of True Grit.
Quickdraw's cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds for every pellet impacting an enemy.
True Grit: For each stack, Graves gains bonus armor. Subsequent casts of Quickdraw and attacks versus non-minions will refresh the duration of True Grit.
If Graves dashes while reloading, he can cast his other abilities during the dash.Unknown value: bug / 1
Quickdraw will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
E.notes:
* '''Graves''' gains the one additional stack of ''True Grit'' from ''Quickdraw'' if at any point during the dash a {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champion is in front of ''Graves'' within {{tip|er|icononly = true}} 1300 distance.
** Enemy champions have to be targetable to grant the additional stack.
** The additional stack of ''True Grit'' is gained when dashing towards {{tip|clone|clones}} just like actual champions.
** This check never happens if '''Graves''' dashes 0 distance (impossible outside of bugs), and will not always repeat a final time at the very end of the dash. Otherwise, it occurs continously while '''Graves''' is dashing.
** {{pending for test}} Exact angle requirement.

effects.str:
• Bonus Armor:
  • Maximum Armor:

R.name: Collateral Damage
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Graves''' fires an explosive shell in the target direction which deals {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies hit while also {{tip|dash|recoiling}} 300 units in the opposite direction.
Upon hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}} or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes in a cone to deal 80% of its original damage to additional enemies.
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Graves fires an explosive shell in the target direction which deals physical damage to all enemies hit while also recoiling 300 units in the opposite direction.
Upon hitting an enemy champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes in a cone to deal 80% of its original damage to additional enemies.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|250 to 550}} {{as|(+ 150% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Explosion Physical Damage|{{ap|250*0.8 to 550*0.8}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
R.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} to the target hit by the shell (including to non-champions struck before exploding{{bug}}) and {{tip|area damage}} to targets within the explosion cone.
* The projectile will still explode early if the champion hit by the shell is protected by a {{tip|spell shield}}.
* The explosion cone is anchored on the location of the shell missile when it collided with a champion, or otherwise its maximum cast range.
* ''Collateral Damage'' is disabled while {{tip|ground|grounded}} but not while {{tip|root|rooted}}.
* '''Graves''' will not {{tip|dash}} after the cast time if he is {{tip|airborne}}.
{{Effect at cast time end}}

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 150% bonus AD)
  • Explosion Physical Damage: (+ 120% bonus AD)
